channel.title: voice on Leslie TANG
channel.description: Recent content in voice on Leslie TANG

item.title: About Voice and Speech
item.description: I recorded 2 video with voiceover recently. I realize I hate my voice. I experimented, I realized I like my voice better when I speak faster. And then I tried speeding up my voice. After the pitch change as an effect of speeding up at 1.3-1.5x, it actually sounded way better. Although it sounded way higher pitched than my normal vocal range. Still, it’s a fun experiment. What are the components of the voice we produce?
